A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The last Jedi is a deconstruction of everything that we saw in star Wars in the last decades. Isolated from the Star Wars universe has a very beautiful 3rd act and good performances. However the narrative lost itself in unnecessary side quests that doesn't lead to nowhere. Inside of the universe that we know the movie sounds like a non-canon fiction made by someone who never lost a second to watch and analyse the characters and universe built through decades. It's a shame seeing what they made with this universe. Paradoxically the movie tries to give a hypocrite message of respect and learn with the old...
